H1.text: when did the soviet union start and end. In Eastern Europe

H3.text: when did the soviet union start and end. in Eurasia

A4.text: The Union of Soviet Socialist Republics (USSR), commonly known as the Soviet Union, was a transcontinental country that spanned much of Eurasia from 1922 until its dissolution in 1991.

A5.text: Lowering of the Soviet flag on 25 December 1991

A6.text: The Soviet Union formally dissolved on December 26, 1991, ending nearly seven decades of Soviet rule.

A7.text: The Soviet Union was a transcontinental country that spanned much of Eurasia from 1922 until its dissolution in 1991.
